Summary:

The story of "Odd Thomas" tells the story of a young chef Thomas (Anton Yelchin), who has not only psychic abilities, but can communicate with the dead - a secret that only they know his girlfriend Stormy and local sheriff (Willem Dafoe). Everything in the life of Thomas goes according to plan, until one night he came across a strange man who claims to be a link between lethal ground forces and the Earth.
